text: Iyo biza kuba inyungu za hafi n'urugendo rutagoranye bari kugukurikira, ariko rwababereye rurerure kandi ruvunanye. Bazanarahira ku izina rya Allah bagira bati “Iyo tuza kubishobora rwose twari kujyana namwe.” Bariyoreka ubwabo (kubera ibinyoma n’uburyarya byabo), nyamara Allah azi neza ko ari abanyabinyoma
